1.text: Crack your egg(s) into a large mixing bowl.

2.text: Beat the eggs until the whites and yolks are combined.
2.vid: /9/94/Make Scrambled Eggs Without Milk Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Heat up butter or oil in a skillet over medium heat.
3.vid: /d/d4/Make Scrambled Eggs Without Milk Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Reduce heat to low after the butter or oil is heated through.

5.text: Pour the egg mixture into the pan.
5.vid: /8/88/Make Scrambled Eggs Without Milk Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Use a spatula to push the eggs across the pan.
6.vid: /7/77/Make Scrambled Eggs Without Milk Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.text: Add in other ingredients about halfway through the cooking time.

8.text: Start folding the eggs in on each other once you see large lumps form.
8.vid: /9/91/Make Scrambled Eggs Without Milk Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Add salt and pepper once the eggs are close to being fully set.
9.vid: /f/f8/Make Scrambled Eggs Without Milk Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Turn off the heat once there's very little liquid egg left.

11.text: Remove the eggs from the pan with a spatula and place them on your plate.
11.vid: /5/58/Make Scrambled Eggs Without Milk Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

12.text: Sprinkle on any additional garnishes or toppings.

13.text: Let the eggs rest for 1 minute before eating.
